## Load Packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(readr)
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Data Links
```{r}
## https://data.cdc.gov/Case-Surveillance/United-States-COVID-19-Cases-and-Deaths-by-State-o/9mfq-cb36/data
## https://opendata.dc.gov/datasets/62f6f28dbfc74ae489fa3dcda9e94744_28/about
```

## Load Data
```{r}
DF1 <- read.csv("United_States_COVID-19_Cases_and_Deaths_by_State_over_Time.csv")
DF2 <- read.csv("DC_COVID-19_Total_Positive_Cases_by_Neighborhood.csv")
```

## Filter Data to D.C.
```{r}
DC <- DF1 %>%
  filter(state == "DC")
```

## Plot Neighborhood Data
```{r}
ggplot(data = DF2, mapping = aes(x = NEIGHBORHOOD, y = TOTAL_POSITIVES, fill = "DATE_REPORTED")) +
  geom_col()
```
